mutants.code:
def calculate_maximum_moves(P: int, Q: int, R: int) -> int:
    heights = sorted([P, Q, R])
    max_moves = max(heights[1] - heights[0], heights[2] - heights[1]) + 1
    return max_moves

def calculate_maximum_moves(P: int, Q: int, R: int) -> int:
    heights = sorted([P, Q, R])
    max_moves = max(heights[1] - heights[0], heights[2] - heights[1]) * 1
    return max_moves

def calculate_maximum_moves(P: int, Q: int, R: int) -> int:
    heights = sorted([P, Q, R])
    max_moves = max(heights[1] - heights[0], heights[2] - heights[1]) - 2
    return max_moves
